actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 for the purpose of permitting communities to waive, under certain conditions, land use and management requirements issued in accordance with such act.

summary.text: Amends the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to permit communities participating in flood insurance programs to waive, under specified conditions, land use and management requirements prescribed by such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 for the purpose of permitting communities to waive, under certain conditions, land use and management requirements issued in accordance with such act.
